object.name: ChatMemberOwner
object.description: Represents a chat member that owns the chat and has all administrator privileges.
object.html_description: Represents a chat member that owns the chat and has all administrator privileges.
object.rst_description: Represents a `chat member <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#chatmember>`_ that owns the chat and has all administrator privileges.

annotations.description: The member's status in the chat, always 'creator'
annotations.html_description: The member's status in the chat, always “creator”
annotations.rst_description: The member's status in the chat, always 'creator'
annotations.name: status

annotations.description: True, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.html_description: True, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.name: is_anonymous
